parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents the same request from being sent repeatedly.

parameters.name: StopMethod
parameters.description:
The method used to pause the backup plan. Valid values:

- ALL: Pauses the backup schedule, full data backup jobs, incremental log backup jobs, and restore jobs.

- PLAN: Pauses only the backup schedule.
